H0.text: with which ancient ruler did julius caesar fall in love. Cleopatra

H1.text: with which ancient ruler did julius caesar fall in love. Servilia

H2.text: with which ancient ruler did julius caesar fall in love. Calpurnia

H3.text: with which ancient ruler did julius caesar fall in love. Pompeia

A4.text: Cleopatra and Caesar had a private affair which produced a son, Caesarion.

A5.text: Caesar remained publicly silent about Caesarion, possibly due to his still childless marriage with Calpurnia.
